Source of data.

* [ IBD cosMX GarridoTrigo2023](d_cosmxIBD.html)  : 
[Macrophage and neutrophil heterogeneity at single-cell spatial resolution in human inflammatory bowel disease_](https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pubmed/37495570) from Garrido-Trigo et al 2023. This dataset includes cosmx samples across 9 individuals; 3 healthy, 3 with chrones disease and 3 with  Ulcerative colitis.
* [Fuiten 2023 - Digits in a Dish](d_DigitsDish.html) : *Digits in a dish: An in vitro system to assess the molecular genetics of hand/foot development at single-cell resolution* Allison M. Fuiten, Yuki Yoshimoto, Chisa Shukunami, H. Scott Stadler. Fronteirs in Cell and Developmental Biology 2023.
